mapper.insert: insert into user_info(user_id, user_nick, user_birthdate, user_profile_img, user_gender, user_type) value(#{user_id}, #{user_nick}, #{user_birthdate}, #{user_profile_img}, #{user_gender}, 'n')
mapper.update: update user_info set user_nick = #{user_nick} where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_nick, user_birthdate, user_profile_img, user_gender, (select count(*) from board_info where user_id = #{user_id}) as user_board_cnt, (select count(*) from course_info where user_id = #{user_id}) as user_course_cnt from user_info where user_id = #{user_id}
